TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFieldTemplateFactory

summary.span: 定义由创建字段模板的对象实现的接口。

span.span: Defines an interface implemented by objects that create field templates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类必须由类实现才能 创建字段模板。This class must be implemented by the class in order to create a field template. 此接口提供了初始化 和创建字段模板的方法。This interface provides methods that initialize the and creates field templates.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplate CreateFieldTemplate (System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn column, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode mode, string uiHint);

Public Function CreateFieldTemplate (column As MetaColumn, mode As DataBoundControlMode, uiHint As String) As IFieldTemplate

public: System::Web::DynamicData::IFieldTemplate ^ CreateFieldTemplate(System::Web::DynamicData::MetaColumn ^ column, System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataBoundControlMode mode, System::String ^ uiHint);
abstract member CreateFieldTemplate : System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn * System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode * string -> System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplate

param.name: column

param.span: 指定要使用的字段模板。

summary.span: 使用 类、 类和 属性创建字段模板的实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of a field template using the class, the class and property.

span.span: An instance of a object when implemented in a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 动态数据字段模板是将数据控件映射到数据模型中的数据类型的 ASP.NET 用户控件。ASP.NET Dynamic Data field templates are ASP.NET user controls that map data controls to data types in a data model. 字段模板通常派生自 ，该类可用于访问数据模型中的数据字段、数据列和元数据。Field templates generally derive from , the class that enables access to data fields, data columns, and metadata in data models. 动态数据项目提供默认字段模板，但你可以对其进行修改或创建自定义字段模板。Dynamic Data projects provide default field templates, but you can modify them or create custom field templates. 实现时，此方法基于数据列、数据列的模式和属性创建字段模板 。When implemented, this method creates a field template based on the data column, the mode of the data column, and the property. `uiHint`如果要使用自定义字段模板呈现数据，请指定参数。You specify the `uiHint` parameter if you want to render data using a custom field template.

param.name: model
param.span: 指定字段模板使用的数据模型。

span.span: Specifies the data model that the field template uses.

summary.span: 使用指定数据模型初始化 。

span.span: Initializes a using the specified data model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 动态数据使用字段模板来显示单个数据字段。ASP.NET Dynamic Data uses field templates to display individual data fields. 字段模板通常作为用户控件实现，这些控件将数据模型中的数据类型映射到数据控件中的各个字段。Field templates are typically implemented as user controls that map data types in a data model to individual fields in the data control. 此方法初始化 类，该类用于使用字段模板将要使用的数据模型创建字段模板。This method initializes the class, which is used to create field templates using the data model the field template will use.
